solution.text:
It is given that \(_{j}_\times(perimenter)=_{k}_\times(area)\)
\(\Rightarrow_{j}_\times(2\times \pi r)=_{k}_\times(\pi r^2)\)
On solving we get, \(2\times_{j}_\over_{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow r=_{{trunc(Decimal('2')*j/k,2)}}_\)

content.text:
If the _{j}_times perimeter and _{k}_ times area of a circle are numerically equal
then find the radius of the circle
